snippet.title: Power Chord - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist & Follow on Steam: https://smarturl.it/PowerChord-Steam

Power Chord is a team-based roguelike deck-building game. Assemble your band, battle your way through legions of demons, discover new cards to enhance your instruments of destruction, and take back the city, one dive bar at a time.

__________________

FOLLOW BIG BLUE BUBBLE

Website: https://www.bigbluebubble.com
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/big-blue-bubble/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bigbluebubble/
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/BigBlueBubble
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bigbluebubble/
#BigBlueBubble
